Articles.Content:
I've been having various errors that I thought were mod related but now I'm not sure because Steam says I had 52 corrupted files! 

Steam pic

I just got the 2 DLC downloaded through Steam a couple weeks ago and have not run the Steam local file check since then. 

Before this, I have always seen at least 1 corrupted file after opening/ closing KSP. The most I've seen before is 8. 

I've run all kinds of disk and memory checks before and found nothing. I'm not having any problems outside KSP. 

I verified 5 other games and only found 1 bad file.

Has anybody else experienced this? Anything I can reasonably do except run the file check constantly?

1 hour ago, Krazy1 said:

I've been having various errors that I thought were mod related but now I'm not sure because Steam says I had 52 corrupted files! 

You can try disabling cloud saving if you have that enabled.

Sometimes, its not very common, it brings back bad files every single time, i had this with Ark but not with Kerbal but it might be something that can help.

Edited November 15, 2020 by Boyster
I already had cloud backup off a few months back. It has 950 MB used/ 0 available. Thanks.

On 11/16/2020 at 1:46 AM, Krazy1 said:

I already had cloud backup off a few months back. It has 950 MB used/ 0 available. Thanks.

950mb used? wow, umm maybe try going to steam settings->downloads->clear download cache that might help.

To be honest i do think its something mod related that corrupts certains files, by corrupt i mean altering them enough to be invalidated.

Edited November 17, 2020 by Boyster

Thanks Boyster. I deleted the Steam cache like you suggested. The cloud content is still there but I doubt that's it. Maybe it's the mods... but where to start. I I do have mods that do not state v1.10 compatibility. Even KAC doesn't claim it is. 

I just checked the local files with Steam again after getting some new null reference exceptions and I had 45 files corrupted. Does anybody actually get 0 file errors? I always get at least 1 bad - pretty sure even with stock too.

Here's the game files. I don't know how to see the list of corrupted files Steam found.

CKAN mod list

KSP log

Player log

Thanks for looking.
